forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 49, with temperatures rising to around 51 overnight. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco awakens to a gentle embrace of mostly cloudy skies, the air crisp and tinged with the coolness that marks the transition from night to day. As the early hours stretch toward dawn, temperatures oscillate around the low fifties, coaxing the faintest hints of warmth before the sun breaks through to herald a more cheerful Sunday. The northeast winds whisper softly, nudging the clouds along while leaving a hint of expectation hanging in the atmosphere.

As the sun rises, it promises to illuminate the day in hues of blue against a backdrop of gradually dispersing clouds. With a high nudging against sixty-two, the afternoon will settle into a more moderate charm, as temperatures begin to dip back into comfort as the shifting light alters the landscape. Fog may linger near the water's edge, caressing the famed bridge with a cool maritime blanket, while the downtown skyline stands sharp and clear, revealing the vibrant hustle of the city beneath its sunlit cloak. 

To navigate this day with ease, layering becomes paramount. A light jacket will provide just enough protection against the chill while a breathable shirt underneath keeps you comfortable throughout the afternoon's warming embrace. Such weather invites subdued adventure—a stroll along the Embarcadero or a quiet sit on a park bench fortified with a good book can be remarkably satisfying under these conditions. Those seeking a touch of creativity might indulge in a visit to local galleries, where the spirit of the city is captured amid its artistic expressions, as the day slowly unfolds into its full splendor.
